official_title: A bill to provide that the terms of the Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System shall be concurrent with the term of the President of the United States.

summary.text: Makes the terms of the Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System concurrent with that of the President of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the terms of the Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System shall be concurrent with the term of the President of the United States.
